price: (យើងបានបញ្ចុះ)គម្ពីរគួរអានជាភាសាអារ៉ាប់ដែលគ្មាន ភាពវៀចវេរឡើយ សង្ឃឹមថាពួកគេនឹងកោតខ្លាចយើង។
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan ghayra dhī ʿiwajin laʿallahum yattaqūna
